Posts.Content: my doctor told me six week too
Posts.Signature: 46 years old father of 2 psa 3.1 gleson 3+4/7 mri done pre op 5-19 op 6-11-12 cancer by nerves
Posts.Title: Exercising after da vinci surgery

Posts.Content: well. had opt on june 11/2012 everything went great.released next day from hospital. had cath in until 6/19 the doctor said cancer stayed in prostate great news again. well cath wasn't to bad the week went fast and not much pain slept in easy chair with pillow on stomack helped alot. now dealing with leakage when getting up from sitting.and some movements.not to bad but still sucks doc said he saved some nerves but not all. has me on 25 mil of viagra well it makes it stand up 3/4 of the way so thats good news.but want the leakage and dribbles to stops so doing kegels as was tolded to do.all in all glad i went with opt will be here for along time with family priceless
Posts.Signature: 46 years old father of 2 psa 3.1 gleson 3+4/7 mri done pre op 5-19 op 6-11-12 cancer by nerves
Posts.Title: Da Vinci robotic prostatectomy recovery-

Posts.Content: around 2.5 hours largest incision is about 5 inchs my gleason was 3+4 after surgery doc said no cancer out side prostate. hardest part is quiting smoking so far so good,using eletric cig
Posts.Signature: 46 years old father of 2 psa 3.1 gleson 3+4/7 mri done pre op 5-19 op 6-11-12 cancer by nerves
Posts.Title: Da Vinci robotic prostatectomy recovery-

Posts.Content: been doing kegels seem to help and doctor put me on meds for over active bladder helping alot still have alittle leakage a couple time a day .but getting better. psa came back undetectable!
Posts.Signature: 46 years old father of 2 psa 3.1 gleson 3+4/7 mri done pre op 5-19 op 6-11-12 cancer by nerves
